title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 670.4 - Ambulatory surgery services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 670.4 - Ambulatory surgery services

State Regulations

The factors and methodology to be considered by the Public

Health Council for determining the public need for ambulatory surgery services
and facilities, shall include, but not be limited to those set forth in section
709.5
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
670.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
